channel.title: Kpcli on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Kpcli on TLDRBins

item.title: Keepass
item.description: Master password cracking keepass2john <KDBX> > hash # With a key file keepass2john -k <KEY_FILE> <KDBX> > hash kpcli # Open kdbx kpcli --kdb <KDBX> # Open kdbx with a key file kpcli --key <KEY_FILE> --kdb <KDBX> # List all passwords find . # Show password (e.g. #0) show -f 0 # Export attachment (e.g. #0) attach 0 Ref: Download kpcli
